text: Hello....how are you?
Hi, how's it going? I'm not bad, tired though
I feel the same. It's been a long day.
Yeah... so what are we supposed to talk about, as far as social issues?
Well, there is a charity called Save The Children that is desperate for donations no matter how small to help children in war torn and third world countries. How do you feel about that?
I've heard about the organization. I guess I would be willing to make a small donation towards the org, but I wish the process of how the money gets to these countries was more transparent

I know what you mean but I'm willing to donate a little. I keep thinking that if everyone just gave $1 how that could add up to really help some poor kids. I was lucky to have everything I needed when I was growing up. I would like to try to help someone else.

Yeah, I grew up pretty poor, not third world poor, but I know what it\'s like to go hungry. It\'s terrible and there really is enough wealth in the world to "solve" poverty. Honestly governments and corporations could work together to do this, but yeah, every person donating say $1 a day of course makes a difference too
How much would you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment which is $2.
I'll donate $0.10.
Ok, thanks! The research team will collect all donations and send them to Save The Children.
Awesome, thanks for chatting.
Thanks, have a nice day!
You too. Bye!
I think we have to chat a bit longer. I think we're supposed to each do 10 chats and we've only done 7.
Oh ok, it says to go until a donation agreement is reached. How much will you donate?
I'm willing to donate $1.
You're very generous. 1/2 your payment. Going by the tithing rule (10%), I should have donated $0.20. :)

I just feel that I like to share since it is money I didn't expect to make in the first place. There's always someone out there who has it worse than I do by far and if $1 helps it will make me feel good to help even just a little.

True, true, that makes sense. I guess I'm more pragmatic. Sure, there are people out there who have it relatively worse than us, but it's still a struggle, and I can't justify giving up half my earnings. I mean, for me, this is my side income (Mturk). Anyway, hope we're close to 10 chats
We finally did the 10 chats! Thanks for your donation! Every little bit does help. Goodbye!
